description:
This is the story of a maid who is all alone in the world, but who finally finds a family.

Told from young that her only worth is as a killer, Yuki had known nothing else except cold efficiency and following orders. Now that she has a chance to leave her past behind, she arrives at the doorstep of Hitoyoshi Yokoya, asking to be employed… as a maid?! Thus begins the journey of a former assassin learning what it means to be ‘normal’!

(Source: Shogakukan)

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Assassins
tags.description: Centers around characters who murder people as a profession.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Estranged Family
tags.description: At least one family member of the MC intentionally distances themselves or a family distances themselves from a person related to the MC.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Rehabilitation
tags.description: Prominently features the recovery of a character who became incapable of social life or work.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Cohabitation
tags.description: Features two or more people who live in the same household and develop a romantic or sexual relationship.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Denpa
tags.description: Works that feature themes of social dissociation, delusions, and other issues like suicide, bullying, self-isolation, paranoia, and technological necessity in daily lives. Classic iconography: telephone poles, rooftops, and trains.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Ninja
tags.description: Prominently features Japanese warriors traditionally trained in espionage, sabotage and assasination.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Fashion
tags.description: Centers around the fashion industry.

node.description:
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%B8%A1%E8%BE%BA%E6%AD%A9)

Ayumu Watanabe is a director, screenwriter, storyboard artist and a former animator.

[Website](http://hitodama.info/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/hitodama1103/)

A Japanese singer, songwriter, radio personality and scriptwriter.

She has released 17 singles and 11 albums since her debut as a 13-year-old in 1994. Several of her songs have been used as anime theme songs. She is often mistaken for a voice actress because she is in the same field of activity as idol-esque voice actresses. When she is working as a screenwriter, she goes by the name Deko Akao, an alias made up from her senior [Satoru Akahori](https://anilist.co/staff/97460/)'s name.

Mother of a son and twin daughters.
Tomoyasu Kurashima is an animator, animation director, character designer and illustrator.

**[Profile (ONEMUSIC)](http://one-music.jp/tokuda/index.html)**

Masahiro Tokuda is a Japanese musician, composer, arranger and guitarist.

Japanese math rock band from Kyoto.

[Official Website](https://tricot-official.jp)

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/DUST_CELL) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/DUSTCELL)__

__Formed:__ 2019

__Introduction:__
DUSTCELL is a Japanese musical duo consisting of female vocalist EMA and male music producer Misumi, who are signed to KAMITSUBAKI STUDIO. They initially debuted on October 11, 2019 with their song "CULT". The song appeared as a music video animated and directed by ligton, who seems to frequently collaborate with the unit.

__Members:__
- [EMA](https://anilist.co/staff/171906/EMA) – vocalist, rapper
- [Misumi](https://anilist.co/staff/171905/Misumi) – in-charge of lyrics, composition and arrangement

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/editzhirose)** | **[Website](http://www.editz.jp/)**

**Hirose Kiyoshi** is a Japanese editor and film editor.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/soft_okuda) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/奥田維城)

Affiliated with Swara Pro.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%B8%A1%E8%BE%BA%E6%AD%A9)

Ayumu Watanabe is a director, screenwriter, storyboard artist and a former animator.

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/guimarques78/) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/guimarques78)

Guilherme Marques is a Brazilian actor, voice actor, dubbing director, and architect.

__Non-Anime Roles:__
~!- Dickon Tarly (Game of Thrones)
- Antonio Garcia / Gold Samurai Ranger (2nd voice; Power Rangers: Samurai)
- Shisui Uchiha (Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4 and Naruto X Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections)
- Mr. Phillip Frond (2nd voice - 2nd season onwards; Bob's Burgers)
- Travis Marshall (Dexter)
- Pietro Maximoff / Quiksilver (LEGO Marvel's Avengers)
- Joseph Turner (Call of Duty: WWII)
- George Takei (2nd voice; Futurama)
- Harald Fairhair (Assassin's Creed Valhalla)
- Chief (2nd dub; The Fox and the Hound)
- Amang Paso and Bantay (Trese)
- Sergeant Kong Chul-Ho (Descendants of the Sun)
- Joseph Campbell (Rick and Morty)
- Ricpon (Power Rangers Ninja Steel)
- David Hasselhoff (Close Enough)
!~

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/guilhermedebarros/)

Guilherme de Barros is a Brazilian actor and voice actor.

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/dolymon27/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/doloresmondrag4)

Dolores Martínez Mondragón is a Mexican voice actress.
